item.title: BluBracket Slack App
item.description: Visit the Slack App creation page. Click the Create New App button. Click the From an app manifest option. Select your workspace and click Next. item.title: Slack Connection
item.description: Requirements # Create a BluBracket Slack App and install to your workspace. Creating a Slack Connection # Navigate to Slack integrations by clicking the Slack link on the integrations page Begin creating a BluBracket Slack connection by clicking the + CONNECTION button Visit the installations page in your BluBracket Slack App and copy the bot token presented on the screen.

item.title: Slack Subscription
item.description: Requirements # Create a BluBracket Slack App and install to your workspace. Create Slack connection Creating a Slack Subscription # Navigate to Slack integrations by clicking the Slack link on the integrations page Click the + SUBSCRIPTION button to begin the creation process. Choose a name for the subscription as well as the saved filters you would like the subscription to be based on.
